content.title: Heads up! FinnsFarm 2-Stroke Hotlap Challenge will be Live Friday, 8/25 10PM UTC
body: One Week to run the fastest laps you can on FinnsFarm riding a Factory 250 2-Stroke.
Winner Prizes - $50 Paypal for MX Fastest Lap | $50 Paypal for SX Fastest Lap
Bonus Prize - $50 Paypal Best video edit on the track, you must Tag or DM @systemdecal.mxb on instagram we will judge and reveal this 2 days after the competition is concluded.
Podium Prize - 2nd and 3rd Fastest Laps on each layout will receive a custom factory bike skin on the brand of their choice.
